transcript:
Customer: Haan sir. Shailen ji aawaz aa rahi hai?
Executive: Haan Shailen sir aawaz aa rahi hai abhi?
Customer: Haan aa rahi hai. Are sir wo bahut jyada yaha network ka problem hai actually mein. Main pehle hi aapko bata raha tha isiliye whatsapp mein kar kijiye na calling. Are whatsapp pe calling actually mein yaha pe sir mana hai na ye actually mein jaise ki call aap keh sakte ho ki record hoti hai na quality training purpose ke liye.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Haan abhi to chalo koi nahi abhi main ispe kar leta hu whatsapp ka bhi main aapko number de dunga apna kyuki sir kai kai bar to aapke question aayenge na kuch na kuch ki sir ye dikkat aa rahi hai dikkat aa rahi hai to easy way ke liye wo sahi rahega.
Customer: Hmm hmm. Theek hai to abhi jaise ki aap bata rahe ho theek thak bas kam chal raha hai aur isko better tarike se aap karna chahte ho.
Executive: Khaas nahi chal raha hai bas ek do ek do inquiry aa rahi hai. Wahi keh raha hu theek thak hi keh raha hu main abhi kaha kaha keh raha hu ki bahut achcha aa raha hai aapko abhi business. Haan aur bas ek kehna ye hai ki thoda bahut jo hai call ka jo aa jata hai to usme theek thak customer mil jate hain but lead mein actually mein competition rehta hi hai sir.
Customer: Hai ki nahi? Kyuki lead mein kya hai na sir us ek particular lead ko panch supplier purchase karte hi hain to waha pe ek minute okay sir.

Executive: Hello?
Customer: Haan sir.
Executive: Aawaz aa rahi hai sir meri abhi? Haan haan aa rahi hai. Achcha theek hai theek hai theek hai. Ek sir main aapke pura product ko review kar raha tha hai na 43 products hain IndiaMART pe. Aur to kuch products aise hain jinme score low aa raha hai jaise wheel barrow aapka product hai na sir. Hmm hmm. Hai na wheel barrow trolley bolte honge basically.
Customer: Kya cheez?
Executive: Wheel barrow trolley bolte honge na sir usko.
Customer: Haan haan. Theek hai. Are wo teen word ka naam nahi rehta to usme score nahi milta hai aapko theek hai. To wheel barrow trolley mein kya dikkat hai ki humko na ek do photo aur lagani hai aur usme detail nahi hai jaise ki kya load capacity hai uski hai na single wheel hai double wheel hai ya triple wheel hai hai na jo bhi hai body material kya hai hai na is tarike se jo hai detailing aapki add honi hai jisse aapka wo do char product jo hai unki jo hai visibility aur better hogi aur inquiry aur calls ka flow aapka badhega. Haan haan. Theek hai na? Ek minute sir thoda sa line par rahiye ga. Haan haan haan okay okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to improve business and lead quality.

- Low score on wheel barrow product.



Resolution:

- Executive suggested adding more photos and details.

- Suggested adding load capacity, wheel type, body material.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, product review, score, visibility
